# Procedure â€” style.guide

Note: Internal procedure (no new protocol intent).

Inputs

- Style objectives, voice references, motif inventory.

Preconditions

- TU open; stakeholders agree on register and motifs.

Process

1. Draft/update style guide sections (voice, register, diction, motifs).
2. Update register_map entries with examples and counter-examples.
3. Circulate to roles; gather feedback via `human.question` where choices exist.
4. Emit `tu.checkpoint` capturing changes and adoption notes.

Outputs

- Updated style guide note and register_map suggestions; checkpoint summary.

References

- 02-dictionary/artifacts/register_map.md; 00-north-star/QUALITY_BARS.md (Style)
